Title: PowerBi Developer
Description:
ü§îWho are we?




As the founding entity of RAINBOW PARTNERS, Quanteam is a consulting firm specializing in the fields of Banking, Finance, and Financial Services. Guided by our core values of closeness, teamwork, diversity, and excellence, our team of 980 expert consultants, representing 35 different nationalities, collaborates across 12 international offices: Paris, Lyon, New York, Montreal, London, Brussels, Geneva, Lisbon, Porto, Casablanca, Madrid and Singapore. Committed to sustainability (Ecovadis Gold), diversity (gender index: 92%), and quality of work life (Best Workplace Experience), Quanteam is a forward-thinking enterprise.




üöÄ Our Expertise




With a dual expertise in both business and IT, Quanteam supports its corporate clients (investment banks, asset management companies, private and retail banks, custodians, etc.) across the entire Front-to-Back spectrum in evolving their business activities and transformation projects.




Our teams are organized into 5 expertise areas:

‚û° Quantitative Finance

‚û° Risk, Compliance, and Regulatory

‚û° Operations and Finance

‚û° Transformation and Organization

‚û° Information Systems

In 2023, Quanteam generated a revenue of ‚Ç¨74.6 million.







üîé We are looking for a Senior Power BI Developer with a strong analytical mindset and a drive for excellence to join our growing team.




Main Tasks:

Design, develop, and deploy engaging Power BI dashboards and reports.
Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand their needs and turn data into actionable insights.
Optimize Power BI solutions for performance, usability, and scalability.
Build and maintain ETL processes to integrate data from multiple sources.
Ensure data accuracy and reliability through in-depth analysis and testing.
Support and train users on Power BI tools and features.
Stay ahead of the curve by exploring new Power BI features and industry best practices.




Key Technologies & Tools:

Solid experience in Power BI development.
Solid skills in DAX, Power Query, and data modeling.
Strong SQL and database experience.
Understanding of ETL tools/processes or willingness to learn.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field.
Excellent communication, problem-solving, and collaboration skills.
Fluent English (written and spoken).

Nice to Have:

Knowledge of data warehousing concepts.
Understanding of data visualization best practices.




üìç Hybrid Role in Porto




üöÄIf you feel this opportunity is for you, send your CV and join our team!

HTML:
Are you the NEX T Data Engineer ?


What we value:

  • Bachelor degree in Data Science, Computer Science (or equivalent);

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
ü§îWho are we?

As the founding entity of RAINBOW PARTNERS, Quanteam is a consulting firm specializing in the fields of Banking, Finance, and Financial Services. Guided by our core values of closeness, teamwork, diversity, and excellence, our team of 980 expert consultants, representing 35 different nationalities, collaborates across 12 international offices: Paris, Lyon, New York, Montreal, London, Brussels, Geneva, Lisbon, Porto, Casablanca, Madrid and Singapore. Committed to sustainability (Ecovadis Gold), diversity (gender index: 92%), and quality of work life (Best Workplace Experience), Quanteam is a forward-thinking enterprise.




üöÄ Our Expertise

With a dual expertise in both business and IT, Quanteam supports its corporate clients (investment banks, asset management companies, private and retail banks, custodians, etc.) across the entire Front-to-Back spectrum in evolving their business activities and transformation projects.







Our teams are organized into 5 expertise areas:

‚û° Quantitative Finance

‚û° Risk, Compliance, and Regulatory

‚û° Operations and Finance

‚û° Transformation and Organization

‚û° Information Systems




In 2023, Quanteam generated a revenue of ‚Ç¨74.6 million.







üîéWe are looking for a Data (Engineer) Analyst - Python + SQL




MAIN TASKS:

The analyst will intervene on risk factors and market data across FX, Equity, Rates and Credit asset classes, and will actively:

Analyse all MDM market data inconsistencies detected by PPSM tool, identifying and implementing any actions required for their correction
Support Market data hub team in leveraging on PPSM for streamlining its daily market data certification tasks and weekly/monthly monitoring processes
Collaborate with multiple departments/clients (IT Risk, Project Management, CCA, Front office, ERM, etc.) on a daily basis
Prepare reports and presentations of the project‚Äôs results for senior management
Propose other actions/initiatives aiming to maintain an efficient and clean market data framework







YOUR PROFILE AND SKILLS:

Advanced degree in computer science, data science or finance is a must
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python and SQL, as well as experience with data manipulation and visualization libraries
Knowledge of interest rate, credit, fx, equity and commodity products and risk factors
Experience working in the financial services industry or a related field is a plus
Strong desire to learn and eager to make a meaningful impact in a dynamic and innovative environment
Programming skills (python, SQL)
Proficient in data APIs
Knowledge on valuation systems: Summit, Polypaths, Sophis, Murex, among others is a plus
Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders
Knowledge in financial products and financial market is required
Fluency in English (written and spoken).
Hybrid role based in Porto










üöÄIf you feel this opportunity is for you, send your CV and join our team!

  • Full Remote projects: If you want to work while you enjoy the comfort of your home
  • Full Onsite projects: if you prefer the company of your colleagues!
  • Take care of your well-being: Enjoy our free nutrition, psychologist, general medicine appointments and our yoga and personal training days‚Ä¶ all remote!


Who are we?

Founded in 2008 and based in Lisbon, KCS IT is a consulting company in the field of Information Technology and Services, focused on creating value for our clients through three main areas: Consulting, Outsourcing, Innovation and Training. Our commitment to talent development is unmistakable in the recent opening of the Porto and Azores hubs, which aims to develop technology for the national and international market. Since 2018 we have been elected one of the 10 major companies in the ‚ÄúIndex of Excellence‚Äù, an initiative that aims to reward organizations that invest most in the development and satisfaction of their employees.

Title: Data Engineer
HTML:
Dellent is a consulting company focused in System Information and Telecommunications. Our goal is to help our candidates and consultants to take a step forward in their careers through projects that meet their needs and expectations.

This project is part of the business investment banking and financial services area, and currently has its technological hub in Porto and is working on the development of innovative solutions and support for all operations related to the business.

We are looking for a Data Engineer to work in this project in Porto (Hybrid).

Requirements

  • Between 2 to 5 years of experience;
  • Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or a similar area;
  • Experience working with Java, Hadoop, Hive, Spark, HDFS, Kafka;
  • Experience working with REST web services, JSON format;
  • Knowledge of DevOps tools and continuous integration (Jenkins, Sonar, XLDeploy, XLRelease, etc.);
  • Market Finance: Knowledge of Basel III Risk environments would be a plus;
  • Good knowledge of Agile and Scrum methodologies;
  • Good level of English (mandatory);
  • Basic understanding of French would help (Plus).

We Offer

  • Health insurance;
  • A personalized training plan, with a budget to spend on the training and technical books you find necessary;
  • Constant feedback so you can grow professionally;
  • Remote onboarding process;
  • Team events every semester so you can live new adventures;
  • Culture of proximity and transparency. Your ideas and needs are heard and valued by us!

Apply

If the above sounds like the kind of job opportunity you would want to get involved with, then please do not hesitate to apply here. You can also explore our content about the job market here.

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
Decskill was founded in 2014 as an IT Consulting Company and their main mission is to delivery value through the knowledge. We enable companies to meet the chalenges of digital world by providing our clients with business models that ensure technological capacity, flexibility and agility. We are more than 500 consultants with offices in Lisbon, Porto and Madrid.




DECSKILL operates in 3 main areas:

DECSKILL TALENT, through which we provide our clients with an extension to their IT teams;




DECSKILL BOOST, through which we provide our client with software development models to increase capacity and optimize Time-to-Market, where we create and manage teams that deliver according to their needs, at the desired speed;




DECSKILL CONNECT through which we provide our client with consulting services, as well as the implementation and management of information technology infrastructures.




Our practice results in the creation of value for our customers, either by delivering qualified and value-added services, or through highly qualified and motivated professionals, as well as technology solutions that allow us to operate and transform the business of our customers.




We are looking for an Data Engineer for a project in Lisbon!




Responsibilities:

Leverage large volumes of data from internal sources.
Develop, maintain, and support data pipelines.
Understand and be the point of contact for the business and assess its needs
Ensure architecture meets business requirements
Recommend ways to efficiently provide quality data and added value.
Communicate technical information to non-technical stakeholders, including data analysts, product managers, and business leaders
Prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously, meeting deadlines and delivering high-quality results.




Requirements:

Academic background in Engineering, Economics, Computing, Mathematics, Statistics or related fields
3+ years of experience in data engineering, with a strong background in data architecture
Availability to work in the hybrid model or in person in the Lisbon or Porto office
Professional experience in any data visualization tool such as Tableau or Power BI
Professional experience in data analysis with programming, preferably Python (Pandas)
Proficiency in SQL
Fluency in written and spoken English
Ability to analyze, synthetize and simplify.
Knowledge of descriptive statistics and hypothesis testing is a plus.
Knowledge in Big Data technology such as Pyspark, Presto and Airflow is a plus
Knowledge of Power Query and DAX is a plus
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams
Strong organizational skills, with the ability to prioritize multiple projects and meet deadlines
Fluency in English.
Tableau/PowerBI or other visualization tools is a plus.
CI / CD (Jenkins) is a plus.
Knowledge and interest in financial markets are a plus.




If you‚Äôre interested in this job, please send your CV in to cesaltina.abreu@decskill.com with reference ‚ÄúCA/DataEngineer‚Äù.




Thank You! :)




Decskill is committed to equality and non-discrimination with all our talents. We recruit and promote talent, based on diversity and inclusion, regardless of age, gender, ethnicity, race, nationality or any other form of discrimination incompatible with the dignity of the human being.

Title: Suporte Aplicacional-BI
Description:
Expleo is a trusted partner for your innovation journey. As a global engineering, technology and consulting service provider, we are ideally positioned to help you achieve your ambitions and future-proof your business. With a smart blend of bold thinking and reliable execution, we‚Äôre able to fast-track innovation through each step of your value chain.

We are strategically positioned to build value, with a global footprint across 30 countries.

We are as global and local as you need us to be, with strong best-in-class pan-European technological centres and unique best-shoring capabilities.

We leverage a network of high value-adding affiliates in consulting and industrial excellence, and leading partners across multiple sectors to provide you with the most comprehensive services and solutions in an ever-changing environment.

Essential Skills


Mininum of 6 years of experience on similar roles.
Experience in Business Intelligence and Data WArehouse.
Solid knowledge of SQL / PLSQL.
Experience with reporting tools (MicroStrategy, Analysis Services).
Experience in ETL processes (Datastage, Databricks, SSIS).
Knowledge of Big Data: Hive, Impala, Spark, HBase, Cloud (CDP) and Oozie.
Experience with RAID.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Shell Script and Python, PySpark.
Familiarity with Azure.
Good knowledge of English.

Title: Data Migration Analyst (French Speaker)
Description:
Company Description

Natixis in Portugal is a Centre of Expertise whose mission is to transform traditional banking by developing innovative solutions for the business, operations and work culture of Groupe BPCE worldwide.

Natixis in Portugal is part of the Global Financial Services division, where it applies technology for the development of financial expertise in its two global business lines ‚Äì Corporate & Investment Banking and Asset & Wealth Management ‚Äì and, transversally, for the entities of Groupe BPCE.

The Centre of Expertise, based in Porto, currently has more than 2,400 employees from over 30 nationalities, organised in three main departments: Information Technology, Banking Support Activities and Compliance. These teams work in an integrated, inclusive and transversal way, supporting and creating value for all the business lines and platforms of the group. The project in Porto is one of the biggest investments in Human Resources ever made by Groupe BPCE worldwide.

A disruptive mindset and a culture of proximity and agility identify Natixis in Portugal Team and reflect the company's mission to transform traditional banking at a global scale: a perfect match in the Portuguese dynamics and entrepreneurial ecosystem.

In 2024, Top Employers Institute has awarded Natixis in Portugal the Top Employer Portugal accreditation for the second time. This certification recognizes excellence in people practices, following the example of our head office, in France, who was certified Top Employer France for the eight year in a row.

Job Description

We are looking for a dedicated and detail-oriented Data Migration Analyst to join our Accounting team within the Finance and Risk Platform. You will be part of the "Auxiliary Accounting" squad (COX), contributing to the development of invoice management activities for the Caisses d‚ÄôEpargne and Banques Populaires networks through the XRP ULTIMATE software, customized by our teams.

Key Responsibilities


Regularly communicate with various establishments to monitor the progress of their migration and configuration activities for XRP, ensuring timely file submissions.
Ensure the accuracy and reliability of parameter data files provided by establishments.
Perform integration operations of data or parameter files into the XRP system.
Support establishments during the certification phases, conducting migration controls.
Conduct qualitative assessments of the data transmitted by establishments during data availability.
Address incident tickets that may arise during certification campaigns.
Participate in migration presentation meetings and team/project/product discussions under the guidance of the migration manager.


Qualifications


Proficient in the French language with strong interpersonal skills, essential for interacting with our XRP contacts in establishments.
A high degree of precision and organizational skills is required, with a focus on meeting deadlines and ensuring client satisfaction. You should also demonstrate firmness and discipline when necessary to maintain project timelines.
Ability to integrate smoothly into a team, with excellent listening skills for project management and banking establishment needs.
Adaptability to frequently changing directions and proactive in identifying risks.
Familiarity with JIRA and Confluence; a passion for teamwork and ERP or software package activities, particularly data migration.
Experience with databases and knowledge of SQL will be considered an asset.


Additional Information

At Natixis, we are committed to fostering a working environment where each and every one of our people is treated with dignity and respect and where every voice is heard. Our differences make us collectively stronger and are a source of fulfilment, innovation and performance.

In the framework of its Diversity, Equity & Inclusion policy, Natixis in Portugal has implemented a Blind CV Screening process, with the purpose of reducing hiring bias. A blind CV excludes any personal details which refer to the applicant‚Äôs gender, age or ethnicity. When applying for our positions, please submit a blind CV, that is, with no picture, name, gender, age, nationality, ethnicity and address. Your personal statement, work experience, courses and certifications, education, skills and contact information is what matters to us.

#MuchMoreThanJustAJob

Early morning. Campo 24 de Agosto. In 4 minutes, you are clocking in at the office. Start your day having breakfast with the Team and grab fresh fruit on the way to your seat, in one of Porto‚Äôs most typical neighborhoods. This Purple Day is going to be a busy one: daily meeting ensuring all team members are on the same page regarding work status, priorities and blockers, language class and, just after, a Talent Management meeting with your manager, discussing your career path.

Lunch break. Today, your Team is onboarding newcomers, but also welcoming French colleagues: the perfect excuse to walk downtown and bond over a francesinha. When returning, inhale nature and peace of mind in Natixis Urban Garden (look at the crops; ready to harvest!).

Back inside. Brainstorming session on a new, exciting project in our disruptive and immersive Manaus Village. The afternoon went flying (tasks, meetings, some jokes with your teammates). End it on a high note: celebrating cultural diversity with a Diwali, the Indian festival of lights.

Tomorrow, you attend a conference led by influential speakers in your industry and, the day after, you will work from home, benefitting from some focus time to complete that report and soft skills course on LinkedIn Learning. Once you are done with your work for the day, strike the right note playing with Natixis band or be part of a board games session. If that is too steady for you, meet your colleagues to catch some waves or sail the Douro river during golden hour.
Show more

Once you are done with your work for the day, strike the right note playing with Natixis band or be part of a board games session. If that is too steady for you, meet your colleagues to catch some waves or sail the Douro river during golden hour.

Title: Test Analyst
Description:
Mutual Respect, Empathy, Innovation and Professional Pride. Do you see yourself within these values?

Founded in 2006 under the mission "To Challenge Complexity", Closer Consulting is a Data Science company specialized in Business Intelligence, Advanced Analytics and Artificial Intelligence.

By developing projects in the most diverse industries ‚Äì Banking, Telecommunications, Health, Retail, Energy, Insurance or Aviation - we analyze data, transforming it into knowledge for our clients, allowing them to adopt the best decision-making for their respective organizations and businesses.

We seek a Teste Analyst willing to accept new challenges in our Closer team.

Hybrid working mode with base in Porto.




Essential:

French language.
Minimum 3 years‚Äô experience in Test activities.
Able to build a test schedule.
Risk identification and follow-up.
Coordination and motivation skills.
Systematic, critical, and logical thinking.
Summarization capabilities.
Be committed, demanding and pedagogue.

Desirable:

5 years of experience.
Knowledge on Octane.
Strive continuously for customer satisfaction.
Aim to deliver very high-quality results.
Knowledge in SQL language.
Knowledge in API.
Knowledge in SAS.
Knowledge in Control-M or another scheduler.
Respect the procedures, methodologies, and directives.
Good capability of managing stress and conflicts.
Good listening and questioning ability.
Good learning skills.
Ability to plan work ahead and to prioritize workload.
Be able to adapt to changes and evolution.




Mandatory:

Fluency in French.




If you believe in this match as much as we do, send your CV to leonor.carvalho@closer.pt and reach the closest side of life.

Title: BANK TELLER (PANGASINAN)
Description:
The Customer Sales and Service Associate (CSSA) provides competent, caring, fast and accurate service to client's banking needs in line with the Bank's overall objective of service excellence.

Responsibilities


Processing over-the-counter transactions such as cash and check deposits, withdrawals, encashment, payments and miscellaneous transactions
Assisting UNIPRO for certain activities such as scanning, filing of signature cards and other bank documents
Reviewing all check transactions and verifying authenticity of all notes received
Cross-selling to existing clients of the branch
Referring transacting clients who have queries or are interested in other bank products
Continuously providing a WOW Customer Experience to all transacting clients
Performing other functions that may be assigned from time to time


Qualifications


Bachelor's Degree in any field, preferably business-related
No work experience required but experience in customer service is an advantage
Good communication skills and interpersonal skills
High level of initiative and innovation
Ability to work well with people from various socio-economic classes
Willing to be assigned and rotated to any branch within the area

Title: Senior Technical Program Manager (Federal Programs)
Description:
About Beacon AI

Beacon AI is developing AI pilot assistant technology to transform aviation, flight safety, operational efficiency, and pilot capabilities. We are on a mission to leverage the power of artificial intelligence and advanced data analytics to revolutionize the aviation industry. Join us to be at the cutting edge of technological innovation for the second century of aviation.

Role Overview

We‚Äôre hiring a Technical Program Manager (Federal Programs) to lead critical defense programs, including our work with Special Operations and Air Force communities. This person will drive program execution, support fielding and validation of new aviation technologies, and be a trusted interface between users, engineers, customers, and acquisition teams.

You'll be hands-on with efforts across several contracts and customers, supporting integrations, advanced pilot assistance feature development, and operational software deployments across defense aviation platforms.

What You‚Äôll Do


Lead cross-functional program execution for defense customers, ensuring technical milestones are delivered on time and aligned to mission needs.
Interface with DoD stakeholders (PEOs, TPOCs, acquisition offices, pilots) to manage schedules, updates, deliverables, and feedback loops.
Translate operational needs into technical requirements, particularly for aircraft operations, debrief, mission planning, and pilot assistance.
Coordinate user engagements and flight demonstrations, including simulator events and aircraft integration.
Support proposal development, responses to government solicitations, and long-term roadmap planning.
Ensure contract compliance and timely delivery of CDRLs, milestone demos, technical reports, and training documentation.
Work closely with Beacon‚Äôs engineering, product, and operations teams to keep programs user-focused and technically executable.


What Will Make You Successful


Former DoD pilot or aircrew, ideally with SOF, AFSOC, tactical, or mobility aviation experience.
Experience supporting or working within DoD acquisition offices (e.g., PEO Fixed Wing, AFLCMC).
Familiarity with requirements generation, validation, and transition planning.
Track record of delivering technology programs involving multiple stakeholders and operational users.
Strong skills in stakeholder management, briefings, and written communications.
Comfort navigating the engineering side (with software and hardware teams) and the government side (with end users and contracting officers).
Experience contributing to DoD proposals (writing, grading, reviewing).
Eligible for a DoD security clearance
Willingness to travel 10‚Äì15% to military installations, flight demonstrations, and stakeholder meetings


Bonus Points


Experience with flight test operations or military flight releases.
Familiarity with aircraft modifications, including avionics integration and equipment installation.
Experience with Electronic Flight Bag (EFB) development or deployment.
Understanding aircraft interface devices, aircraft databuses (e.g. ARINC 717/429, or MIL-STD-1553B).
Flight Data Monitoring (FDM) or (Military) Flight Operations Quality Assurance (MFOQA/FOQA) program management.
Exposure to cybersecurity, hazard analysis, or certification processes in aviation or defense settings.


Join Beacon AI to be at the forefront of innovation, driving the transformation of aviation technology and making a tangible impact on the future of flight.

This is a hybrid role and requires working from our San Carlos, CA office at least three days a week, with the option to work remotely the remaining days.

Perks & Benefits For Full-Time Employees


Comprehensive Healthcare Coverage: Enjoy peace of mind with our generous health benefits, with 80% of medical costs covered by the company for the employee and 25% for their dependents.
Paid Time Off: Recharge and relax with 3 weeks of paid vacation, in addition to 14 company-paid holidays each year.
Connectivity Stipend: Stay connected with our cell phone benefit, ensuring you have the tools you need to excel in your role.
Health and Wellness Allowance: Use this towards a gym membership or subscription to a meditation app, empowering you to prioritize self-care and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
Financial Planning: Prepare for the future with our 401(k) program. While we currently do not offer matching, we are committed to enhancing this benefit in the future.


For Nearly All Roles, The Following May Apply

At this time, due to United States Department of State regulations, we are only able to hire U.S. Persons. A U.S. Person is a lawful permanent resident (U.S. citizen, legal immigrant with a 'Green Card', or a protected individual who has been granted permanent asylum or refugee status.) These aerospace restrictions mean that we are unable to provide visa sponsorship or consider candidates who require visa transfers. Applicants must be authorized to work in the United States without the need for visa sponsorship now or in the future. All work must be performed in the United States.

Beacon AI provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, genetic information, disability, or veteran status. In addition to federal law requirements, employer complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training. Employer expressly prohibits any form of workplace harassment based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, genetic information, disability, or veteran status. Improper interference with the ability of employees to perform their job duties may result in discipline up to and including discharge.

Title: Materials Management Specialist
Description:
Job ID: 2779

Location: Cayanga

Company: PV Sinag Power Inc.

Department: Administrative Services and Supply Chain Managemen

Employment Type: Probationary

Work Arrangement: Hybrid

Responsibilities

This position holder is responsible for post-PO activities, such as expediting, goods receiving, logistics, and importations. The incumbent shall provide the necessary shared services and support to the Supply Chain Management to ensure of the attainment of SCM and company objectives by:


Ensuring all orders/contracts, as applicable, are expedited to ensure that the project schedules and contractual delivery requirements are met.
Identifying potential impact actual disruptions in the supplier‚Äôs submission and delivery and recommend solutions.
Identifying shipping requirements and coordination with 3rd party logistics and brokers to ensure compliance to importation requirements.


Role And Responsibilities

Expediting Management


Ensures that all orders/contracts, as applicable, are expedited to ensure that the project schedules and contractual delivery requirements are met.
Expedites the product delivery within the project schedule and requirements i.e. proper handling of all import and export customs documentations and goods clearance.
Controls and monitors all expediting data and other appropriate documents to ensure current information is available and distributed
Identifies potential impact actual disruptions in the supplier‚Äôs submission and delivery for critical supplies
Provides support to the team by:
Participates in pre and post-award meetings and facilities meetings to review and discuss schedules and potential problem areas that may impact required shipment dates as well as Operations meetings.
Highlights and reports orders/contracts where there is a likelihood of delay to equipment or critical materials, which may have an adverse effect on the program together with the proposed corrective action with concerned customers (Facilities, Engineering, Operations).

Logistics and Customs Management


Ensures BOC Audit Preparedness and closure of BOC and importation audit issues.
Ensures SCM BOC / DOE compliance and permits renewals.
Coordinates and provides necessary assistance for Tax Exemption Certificate (TEC) and Duty Free Certificate (DFC) application and digitalized reporting for the company‚Äôs import and export undertakings under RE Law incentives and privileges. Deals with various Philippine Government Offices that deal with taxes, importations/exportations and the like.
Coordinates with brokers and logistics suppliers including pier operations and monitoring in order to achieve the planned required dates.
Processes invoices of all 3rd party logistics / brokers.
Provides support to the team by:
Conducts selection and negotiation with 3rd party logistics and brokers.
Identifies shipping requirements / timescales to relevant delivery point personnel.

Reporting and OTIF Performance Management


Prepares of reports
Regular and ad-hoc status reports to management and other departments as required on all OTIF performance
Status of importations and incoming deliveries, storage and demurrage monitoring
Insurance declaration report
Rejections and reports preparations
Monitoring of debit note & credit note until its fully paid
Monitoring of rejected item until its settlement
Conducts analytics of the following SCM KPIs:
On-time delivery report
Undelivered or Open POs
Supports the various teams of the SCM group to attain their targets and objectives when it comes to OTIF, shipment/ deliveries for critical projects

Job ID: 2779

Location: Cayanga

Company: PV Sinag Power Inc.

Department: Administrative Services and Supply Chain Managemen

Employment Type: Probationary

Work Arrangement: Hybrid

Responsibilities

This position holder is responsible for post-PO activities, such as expediting, goods receiving, logistics, and importations. The incumbent shall provide the necessary shared services and support to the Supply Chain Management to ensure of the attainment of SCM and company objectives by:

  • Ensuring all orders/contracts, as applicable, are expedited to ensure that the project schedules and contractual delivery requirements are met.
  • Identifying potential impact actual disruptions in the supplier‚Äôs submission and delivery and recommend solutions.
  • Identifying shipping requirements and coordination with 3rd party logistics and brokers to ensure compliance to importation requirements.

Role And Responsibilities

Expediting Management

  • Ensures that all orders/contracts, as applicable, are expedited to ensure that the project schedules and contractual delivery requirements are met.
  • Expedites the product delivery within the project schedule and requirements i.e. proper handling of all import and export customs documentations and goods clearance.
  • Controls and monitors all expediting data and other appropriate documents to ensure current information is available and distributed

  • Ensures SCM BOC / DOE compliance and permits renewals.
  • Coordinates and provides necessary assistance for Tax Exemption Certificate (TEC) and Duty Free Certificate (DFC) application and digitalized reporting for the company‚Äôs import and export undertakings under RE Law incentives and privileges. Deals with various Philippine Government Offices that deal with taxes, importations/exportations and the like.
  • Coordinates with brokers and logistics suppliers including pier operations and monitoring in order to achieve the planned required dates.
  • Processes invoices of all 3rd party logistics / brokers.

    • Conducts selection and negotiation with 3rd party logistics and brokers.
    • Identifies shipping requirements / timescales to relevant delivery point personnel.
Reporting and OTIF Performance Management

  • Prepares of reports
    • Regular and ad-hoc status reports to management and other departments as required on all OTIF performance
    • Status of importations and incoming deliveries, storage and demurrage monitoring
    • Insurance declaration report
    • Rejections and reports preparations
    • Monitoring of debit note & credit note until its fully paid
    • Monitoring of rejected item until its settlement
  • Conducts analytics of the following SCM KPIs:
    • On-time delivery report
    • Undelivered or Open POs
  • Supports the various teams of the SCM group to attain their targets and objectives when it comes to OTIF, shipment/ deliveries for critical projects

Title: Branch Cashier - Tarlac Camiling
Description:
The Branch Cashier is responsible for the administration and control of all technical aspects of branch cash operations including physical custody of monies, securities, and collateral. Provides support in the marketing aspects of the branch thru cross selling of bank products and services and ensuring that staff members have full understanding of the same to meet the demands of clients and achieve the targets set for the branch. Participates in credit evaluation of loan application and renewals.

Title: Field Quality Assurance Specialist (Pangasinan)
Description:
The Field QA Specialists are responsible for performing Risk Mitigation activities specific to regulatory compliance, fraud prevention, and company loss.

What You‚Äôll Do


Should have strong knowledge and understanding on the current company processes
Evaluate and monitor Field Visits
Adhere to any process improvement initiatives (e.g. Trackers, Violation Coaching)
Identify possible fraudulent activities that may result to company loss.
Reporting and creating tickets for challenges encountered.
Stand as a POC for internal initiatives like QA Intervention, Adhoc tasks and Special validation/projects.
Coaching and Mentoring Field Officers.
Creating valuable reports based on the collated data and share QA insights.
AdHoc tasks to help the team‚Äôs productivity.


What You Need To Have


At least 1 year of experience to an equivalent role
Experience working in Quality or the likes
Prepare detailed reports and documentation on quality issues, including findings, recommendations, and corrective actions taken.
Escalate potential and fraudulent activities captured during QA Validation
Analytical mind, problem solving, well organized and can be trusted to pay attention to detail.
Excellent communication skills, ability to effectively communicate with senior management
Tagalog, English or Local Dialect spoken and written (our company language) Necessary to Local availability.
Advantage if with motorcyle and updated Driver's license


Job Perks You'll Enjoy


Hybrid work set-up
Permanent dayshift schedule
Up to 20% variable performance-based bonus
HMO on Day 1 / HMO with dependents
Access to mental health coverage and wellness partners
Wellness Leave and Birthday Leave benefits
Internal Career Mobility
Opportunity to work and train in our international offices
